🤖 Master Artificial Intelligence in Monitoring & Evaluation:

Enroll in the “AI for M&E MasterClass” Monitoring and Evaluation (M&E) is evolving—are you keeping up? With the rise of Artificial Intelligence (AI), M&E professionals can now harness machine learning, natural language processing, and predictive analytics to enhance program design, implementation, and impact analysis.

🎓 Introducing the AI for M&E MasterClass - a practical, hands-on 3-week course designed to equip you with cutting-edge data and AI tools to thrive in modern evaluation roles.

🔍 Course Overview

This training is a hands-on, practical 8-session program that walks you through pro-tips on navigating survey data using STATA, R, and Python interchangeably. You’ll learn to create high-quality visualizations and reports that align with top journal and donor standards.

🚀 With the power of AI, you’ll complete tasks 50x faster while boosting accuracy in research logic and reporting.

🧠 Ethical considerations are also covered—including best practices for protecting donor data, IPs, and shareholder confidentiality when using AI tools.

🎯 What You’ll Learn

✅ Hands-on AI tools for M&E (ChatGPT, DeepSeek, Julius)

📊 Practical data analysis in R, STATA, and Python

🧼 Data cleaning, merging, and visualization

📈 Automated reporting and dynamic dashboards

🔍 Statistical techniques: PCA, T-tests, DiD, PSM, RDD

📚 Research-aligned insights and visual storytelling

🏆 Certification awarded upon 70% pass

🧠 Expected Results

Upon completing the course, you’ll walk away with:

🎯 Technical mastery of R, STATA, Python, and key AI tools for monitoring and evaluation

🔬 Confidence using advanced statistical methods like PCA, Likert scales, DiD, T-tests, PSM, and RDD

🛠️ Full command over data cleaning, merging, quality assurance, and automated reporting

📢 Skills to create insights that meet journal and donor standards

🎓 A verified Certificate of Completion to boost your CV and LinkedIn profile

🕒 Duration & Cost

🗓️ Duration: 3 weeks (8 sessions)

💰 Cost: Only 5000 KES / ~$40 – originally priced at $400! 🎉

📆 Start Date: 6th June 2025
